feed.title: Delta Method
feed.subtitle: This website was created as a demonstration for Jekyll custom theme named minimal-music-project. Its main feature is to make it easy to create websites for music projects

entry.title: YyY maybe so
entry.content:
Here you can write more about a certain release, e.g. tracklist:

  1. Y
  2. Yy
  3. YyY
  4. YyYy
  5. YyYyY
entry.summary: This is description of a post. It will appear in the page of it's category with the description or excerpt shown. Clicking each of them will redirect to the page of the post, the same with clicking "Read More"
